scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run setup-db && npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && tsc
scripts.prisma:generate: npm run setup-db && npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate: npm run setup-db && npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate dev --name init --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate:prod: npm run setup-db && npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate deploy --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:seed: npm run setup-db && npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma db seed --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:studio: npm run setup-db && npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma studio --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:reset: npm run setup-db && npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate reset --force --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prepare: npm run setup-db && npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
